value.name: L.A. supervisors want sheriff to immediately name deputies in shooting
value.description: The Los Angeles County Board of Supervisors on Tuesday directed its attorneys to draft an ordinance that would require the Sheriff's Department to publish the names of deputies who open fire while on duty within 48 hours of a shooting.
